div.p: Group 1 Mapping from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/SubstanceDefinition|5.0.0 to unspecified code system

tr.td: FHIR R5 Resource `SubstanceDefinition` is representable via FHIR R4 Resource `SubstanceSpecification`. Element `SubstanceDefinition` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `SubstanceSpecification`.
Element `SubstanceDefinition.meta` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `SubstanceSpecification.meta`.

title.value: Cross-version ConceptMap for FHIR R5 resources in FHIR R4

description.value: This ConceptMap represents the cross-version mapping of resource FHIR R5 for use in FHIR R4.
